actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain limitations on the investment tax credit for public utility property.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the limitation on the investment tax credit for public utility property in cases where the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission makes a determination that the domestic supply of natural gas is insufficient to meet the requirements of the domestic economy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain limitations on the investment tax credit for public utility property.
